sentences.en: " Virtual reality has the potential to become a microscope of the mind. "
sentences.cn: 《虚拟现实》一书的作者霍华德-莱因戈尔德说, “ 虚拟现实很有可能成为人脑的显微镜, ”

sentences.en: A microscope magnifies bacteria so that they can be seen and studied.
sentences.cn: 显微镜把细菌放大,使人们得以看见并研究它.

sentences.en: A new technological marvel was invented at Cambridge University in England, the scanning electron microscope.
sentences.cn: 一项科技新奇迹在英国剑桥大学诞生了——这就是扫描电子显微镜。

sentences.en: A new type of microscope has come into use.
sentences.cn: 一种新型显微镜已开始使用.

sentences.en: An object was magnified 200 times by the microscope.
sentences.cn: 这架显微镜能把物体放大二百倍.

sentences.en: Bacteria under the microscope, even those with no flagella, often bounce about in the water.
sentences.cn: 在显微镜下，细菌，甚至包括那些没有鞭毛的细菌，经常在水中跳来跳去。

sentences.en: Can I borrow your microscope?
sentences.cn: 可以借你的显微镜吗?。

sentences.en: Histology involves looking at cells under a microscope.
sentences.cn: 组织学研究包括在显微镜下观察细胞.

sentences.en: If you look at the paper under a microscope, you will see the fibres.
sentences.cn: 如果在显微镜下观察纸张，就会看见纤维。

sentences.en: Many of these microbes were observed in the infected host by light - microscope.
sentences.cn: 人们用光学显微镜,在受侵染的寄主中观察到这些微生物.

sentences.en: My heart shall never be put under their microscope.
sentences.cn: 我决不让他们来细细品评我的心.

sentences.en: Tell me what you see through the microscope.
sentences.cn: 告诉我你透过这个显微镜所看到的东西。

sentences.en: The electron microscope uses a beam of electrons to produce images at high magnifications.
sentences.cn: 电子显微镜利用电子束形成高倍影像。

sentences.en: The microscope capacitates small objects to be observed.
sentences.cn: 显微镜可以观察到微小的物体。

sentences.en: The microscope contains a few hundred dollars-worth of electronic bits and bobs.
sentences.cn: 这架显微镜内有价值数百美元的电子元件。

sentences.en: The microscope magnified the object two hundred times.
sentences.cn: 这架显微镜把实物放大了200倍。

sentences.en: The microscope magnifies the object 100 diameters.
sentences.cn: 显微镜把物像放大了一百倍.

sentences.en: The slightest movement will defocus the microscope.
sentences.cn: 最轻微的运动都会使显微镜散焦。

sentences.en: The structure of molecules can be seen under an electron microscope.
sentences.cn: 分子的结构可在电子显微镜下观察到.

sentences.en: The students were looking through a microscope at plant cells.
sentences.cn: 学生们正在通过显微镜观察植物细胞.

sentences.en: This microscope magnifies 40 diameters.
sentences.cn: 这台显微镜能放大40倍.
